author: joern
msg: OPENNLP-228 Moved sequence validator out of the name finder, and made it interchangeable

author: mgrigorov
msg: WICKET-3916 FilterForm#enableFocusTracking(FormComponent) method uses ComponentTag#put(String,CharSequence) with key="id" which gives a warning in Wicket 1.5
Change the way component's markup id is rendered.

author: mgrigorov
msg: WICKET-3910 o.a.w.pageStore.AsynchronousDataStore#getData() returns null if the StoreEntryRunnable is currently running
Revert to the previous impl of AsynchronousDataStore.
The one based on ThreadPoolExecutor didn't prove to be stable.
Improve DiskDataStoreTest so that it captures the exceptions thrown by the runnables and fails if there is any problem.
